bioconda.name: bioconductor-undo
bioconda.summary: Unsupervised Deconvolution of Tumor-Stromal Mixed Expressions

biotools.summary: R package for unsupervised deconvolution of tumor and stromal mixed expression data. It detects marker genes and deconvolutes the mixing expression data without any prior knowledge.

bioschemas.name: UNDO
bioschemas.summary: R package for unsupervised deconvolution of tumor and stromal mixed expression data. It detects marker genes and deconvolutes the mixing expression data without any prior knowledge.
